copy.title: First Flight
copy.welcome_text: Hello I am the Minister of Summer. Can you help me teach the baby birds to fly? Click and HOLD to make them flap and they will follow you. Try to collect all of the hanging fruit and get the bird from the nest to the platform.
copy.game_over_win_0: Oh, I'm so excited! You taught all these little birds to fly! Do come back and help again soon!
copy.game_over_win_1: Such a good job, my dear! You turned these little birds into flying masters! Thank you, and come back again!
copy.game_over_win_2: You're such a good flight instructor! Thank you, and I'd love your help again anytime!
copy.game_over_win_3: Look at all those happy birds flapping around! And there will always be more who need to learn, so come back soon!
copy.game_over_win_4: You did a flaptastic job! Please come back soon to help again. You're a first rate flight instructor!
copy.game_over_lose_0: Oh no! We ran out of birds to teach! Well, you can always try again. Thank you for helping me!
copy.game_over_lose_1: Well, you gave it a good try. Don't worry, next time we'll teach them all to fly!
copy.game_over_lose_moth_0: Oh dear, we ran out of birds to teach. But you can come back any time and help me again!
copy.game_restart_explanation: Oh no! Try again, you have another chance!
copy.game_restart_last_attempt: Holy cow! Now it is our last chance!!!
copy.perfect_level: PERFECT! You got an extra attempt!
copy.clock_alert_1: Be careful! Don't run out of time!
copy.life_0: Good job! You won another chance!
copy.life_1: Nice! You get an extra chance!
copy.loose_a_life_0: Time is up, I'm afraid. Please try again!
copy.instruction0: Press and HOLD the mouse button down to get a bird to flap its wings. If you stop pressing, the bird will float down.
copy.instruction1: When landing a bird, be sure that the color of the bird and the color of the platform match. That's how you get the most points!
copy.instruction2: Collect the hanging fruit to get a bonus!
copy.good_platform_3: Oh, you did that so well!
copy.wrong_platform_1: Check the color of that platform!
copy.wrong_platform_2: I think you're on the wrong platform.
copy.wrong_platform_3: Oh dear, that's the wrong color platform.
copy.wrong_platform_4: Are you sure that's the correct platform?
copy.hit_by_leaf_1: Keep flapping to save your bird!
copy.hit_by_leaf_2: Keep flapping and guide your bird back up!
copy.hit_by_wasp_1: Don't let your bird touch the wasps!
copy.hit_by_wasp_2: Ouch! Keep flapping. Try to save your bird.
copy.loose_bird_0: Your bird is all right, don't worry.
copy.loose_bird_1: It's okay, your bird will try again.
copy.loose_bird_2: Don't worry, your bird is fine. Not all students learn easily!
copy.loose_bird_3: Oh dear, your bird wasn't ready. He'll come back later.
copy.loose_bird_4: Oh, that little bird will have to try again later.
copy.x2_bonus_2: I knew you could get that one!
copy.leaf_disappear_2: Get as many of those as you can!
copy.wasp_disappear_1: Yes, get those whenever you can!
copy.wasp_disappear_2: Yes, keep your eye out for more of those!
copy.collect_fruit_bonus_level_0: Flap faster, you can do it!
copy.collect_fruit_bonus_level_1: Get them all, don't miss any!
copy.collect_fruit_bonus_level_3: The more you get, the bigger your bonus!
copy.collect_fruit_bonus_level_4: Choose your path carefully to get all the fruit!
copy.collect_fruit_bonus_level_5: Try to get all the fruit!
copy.collect_fruit_bonus_level_6: Get the fruit for bonus points -- and a good snack!
copy.general_encouragement_0: Show them your best flying techniques!
copy.general_encouragement_1: The birdies trust you, so don't let them down!
copy.general_encouragement_2: You flap very well, my dear!
copy.general_encouragement_4: Look how eager your bird is to learn!
copy.general_encouragement_5: Do your best! The baby birds depend on you!
copy.general_encouragement_8: I'm so pleased at how well you're doing!
copy.general_encouragement_9: Teaching is a tough job, and you're doing it so well!
copy.easy_story: Baby birds need to learn how to fly. We must help them!
copy.medium_story: These baby birds need to master the art of flapping. I'm so glad you're here to help!
copy.hard_story: These baby birds need more flying practice. Flapping is one thing, but real flying is another. Let's show them how!
copy.royal_story: The baby birds are getting better, but now we need to help them become expert fliers!
copy.easy_exitstory: A wonderful job, my dear! Thank you!
copy.medium_exitstory: Oh, look at all the happy baby birds! You get the credit for that!
copy.hard_exitstory: You have impressive teaching skills! The baby birds are flying beautifully!
copy.royal_exitstory: Look, you helped them all land safely on their platforms! I salute you, my dear!
copy.allmedium_story: A good start, but we need to keep teaching. Birds must learn to avoid stray branches and leaves.
copy.allhard_story: You're a wonderful teacher! But now the birds must learn the finer points of flying. Let's get to it!
copy.allroyal_story: More and more baby birds need our help to fly. Let's focus on teaching them to land safely on the platforms!
copy.tutorial_finalscore_label: Now, let's teach these birds to fly!
copy.tutorial_stepIntro: Welcome to Flapaway Point! I'm going to show you how to teach baby birds to fly.
copy.tutorial_step1: First things first. You need to get the birds to flap their wings.
copy.tutorial_step2: The baby bird will always follow you.
copy.tutorial_step3: If you stop flapping, the bird will stop flapping too.
copy.tutorial_step4: We want the birds to land safely on the platform.
copy.tutorial_step5: Some platforms have different colored banners, so be sure that the bird and platform colors match. That's how you get the most points!
copy.tutorial_step6: Try to get the bird to eat the fruit we've tied to the trees. If they eat enough, you'll get a surprise!
copy.tutorial_step7: This shows how many pieces of fruit the birds need to eat for you to get a bonus!
copy.tutorial_step7bis: Here is your score. And this shows how many birds must land safely for you to finish.
copy.tutorial_step8: This shows how many attempts you have left. If you don't keep flapping, you'll lose one. Remember, I'll be over here if you need me!
copy.tutorial_step9: That's all there is to it! Now, get those baby birds flapping!
copy.tutorial_step10: Great job! Now you're ready to help the baby birds!
copy.bubble_step2: Don't forget to hold down the LEFT mouse button.
copy.level_tip_1: Help the blue bird land on the blue platform.
copy.level_tip_2: Don't forget to have the birds eat all the fruit you can find!
copy.level_tip_3: Guide your bird over the falling "x2" power-up to double the number of points you get for landing it safely.
copy.level_tip_4: Watch out for leaves. If a bird flies into a leaf, they will fall a little bit. Just keep flapping and don't give up!
copy.level_tip_5: Guide your bird over the falling "leaf" power-up, and you'll clear all the leaves off the screen at once!
copy.level_tip_6: Now you have two different colored birds to teach! Be sure to land each one on its matching color platform!
copy.level_tip_10: There are more berries than you think! Collect them and more will appear. Try to get them all!
copy.level_tip_11: Here come pesky wasps who will get in the way. Don't let the birds fly into them!
copy.level_tip_14: Guide your bird over the falling "wasp" power-up and you'll clear all the wasps off the screen at one time!
copy.level_tip_19: You'd better dodge these trees. Try flying the birds into the hole and watch where they pop out. Be alert!
copy.level_tip_24: Land all your birds safely on their platforms and you'll win the game! Come on, I know you can do it!
copy.host_level_1_0: How about we start with one bird at a time?
copy.host_level_1_1: Let's start out with some easy flapping and get a feel for it.
copy.host_level_1_2: I think we should take it slow at first, all right?
copy.host_level_3_0: Keep your eyes alert and your wings flapping!
copy.host_level_3_1: Watch for just the right color platform!
copy.host_level_4_0: You can't fly through branches, you must go around them!
copy.host_level_5_0: Get all the fruit! Birds get hungry flapping like this!
copy.host_level_5_1: You can do it! Keep flapping!
copy.host_level_6_0: Look at those baby birds -- they're really flying!
copy.host_level_6_1: Don't let your birds fall down into the leaves!
copy.host_level_7_0: Remember, you'll get a bonus when you collect enough fruit!
copy.host_level_8_0: You're really good at this! Keep it up!
copy.host_level_9_0: Oh, the mother birds are going to be so proud!
copy.host_level_9_1: You're very good at this. I'm impressed!
copy.host_level_10_0: Isn't it fun to help baby birds fly?
copy.host_level_10_1: Be careful! Look out for leaves!
copy.host_level_11_1: Get ready to flap, baby bird!
copy.host_level_12_0: My, look at all those little birds go!
copy.host_level_12_1: Teaching baby birds to fly is so important!
copy.host_level_13_0: The birds are really catching on here... thanks to you!
copy.host_level_14_0: Guide all your birds to the right colored platforms!
copy.host_level_14_1: Flight lessons are such a joy to watch!
copy.host_level_15_0: I think the birds are getting the hang of it!
copy.host_level_16_0: Oh joy, you got a bonus!
copy.host_level_17_0: I think the baby birds like you!
copy.host_level_18_0: There's nothing cuter than a baby bird!
copy.host_level_19_1: Guide all your birds to right platforms!
copy.host_level_20_0: Look how good these birds can fly now!
copy.host_level_20_1: You must get all your birds to the proper platforms!
copy.host_level_22_0: Your wings can't be tired yet, keep flapping!
copy.host_level_22_1: Can you get your birds to their platforms faster?
copy.host_level_23_0: Get those birds flying as fast as you can!
copy.bonus_level_1: Congratulations! You won a bonus level for collecting fruit! Try to get as much of the fruit as possible before the timer runs out.
copy.bonus_level_2: Excellent! You won a bonus level for collecting fruit! Try to get as much of the fruit as possible before the timer runs out.
copy.bonus_level_3: Congratulations! You won a bonus level for collecting fruit! Try to get as much of the fruit as possible before the timer runs out.
copy.bonus_level_4: Excellent! You won a bonus level for collecting fruit! Try to get as much of the fruit as possible before the timer runs out.
copy.bonus_level_5: Congratulations! You won a bonus level for collecting fruit! Try to get as much of the fruit as possible before the timer runs out.
copy.bonus_level_6: Excellent! You won a bonus level for collecting fruit! Try to get as much of the fruit as possible before the timer runs out.
